price: Kaya manalig ka kay Allāh; tunay na ikaw ay nasa katotohanang malinaw.
arabic: فَتَوَكَّلۡ عَلَى ٱللَّهِۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى ٱلۡحَقِّ ٱلۡمُبِينِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: fatawakkal ʿalā al-lahi innaka ʿalā al-ḥaqi al-mubīni
